titleInfo.title: Manitoba's Climate Change and Green Economy Action Plan

mods.abstract: A comprehensive policy framework which includes a promise of 6000 new green jobs by 2020. Also states: "Manitoba will enshrine environmental rights in legislation and be the first province to formally endorse the Blue Dot Campaign. This new legislation will be a foundation for everything we do and will set Manitoba on a new, greener path."
mods.accessCondition: Copyright retained by the Government of Manitoba
